inclusion.criterion: total thyroidectomy with negative radioactive iodine whole body scan (I-WBS) and elevated stimulated thyroglobulin (sTg) or thyroglobulin antibody (TgAb) levels.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients able to sleep in a fixed position for 20 minutes.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients unable to sit calm without movement during imaging.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients' blood glucose > 11.1 mmol/L (200 mg/dL) measured by glucometer immediately prior to scan.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and underwent XRT, which may be relevant for study.
